title: Lynda - Migrating Access Databases to SQL Server
description:
Lynda - Migrating Access Databases to SQL Server

This Course will be good to the Best for DL within 30 days after has been posed, after that it might not be good DL already, please do me favour to continue seeding to keep this torrent alive.

2h 39m Intermediate Oct 06, 2015   | Uploaded in Feb 19, 2016 by 2boweb
Subject: IT 
Software: Access SQL Server 
Author: Adam Wilbert 
 
At one point Access was adequate. But what happens when your database grows and you need more powerful tools? You can move it! Migration allows you to take advantage of SQL Server's advanced features, and maintain a link to the data in Access.â€¨â€¨Watch this course to learn how to leverage what you already know to take that next step. Adam Wilbert reviews the basics of SQL Server Management Studio (SSMS) and introduces two workflows for migrating Access data: one using a simple export/import process and the other using the free SQL Server Migration Assistant (SSMA). He also shows how to convert Access to SQL data types, link Access to SQL data via an ODBC connection, and address special concerns for Access 2010 data. 
Topics include:
	â€¢	Why upgrade?
	â€¢	Importing a SQL database
	â€¢	Exploring data types and server objects
	â€¢	Installing SSMA
	â€¢	Mapping source and target data types
	â€¢	Using the Migration Wizard
	â€¢	Linking to migrated tables in SSMA
	â€¢	Working with views and stored procedures
	â€¢	Linking Access to SQL Server databases
